encyclopedia.content: 电影名字：这一部片子的主角是雷夫范恩斯。很有趣，因为不久之前，看过一样是他演的《红龙》。看着这么一个瘦瘦高高的人再度饰演着胆小、畏缩而可怜的角色，着实有趣。 也是昆虫蜘蛛的英文，节肢动物。

entry.def: A spider is a small creature with eight legs. Most types of spider make structures called webs in which they catch insects for food.

means.word_mean: 1. predatory arachnid that usually has silk-spinning organs at the back end of the body; they spin silk to make cocoons for eggs or traps for prey
2. a computer program that prowls the internet looking for publicly accessible resources that can be added to a database; the database can then be searched with a search engine
3. a skillet made of cast iron
